sentences.en: FAD ( flavin adenine dinucleotide ) A derivative of riboflavin that is a coenzyme in electron - transfer reactions.

sentences.en: In the past two decades, fitness has become a fad.

sentences.en: Spiritualism was a fad in full flower for half a century.

words.tran_cn: 好新奇的人；趋于时尚者

trans.tran_cn: [生化](=flavin adenine dinucleotide)黄素腺嘌呤二核苷酸
一时的流行，一时的风尚，一时的怪念头
trans.tran_en: something that people like or do for a short time, or that is fashionable for a short time
